quagga.input.subject: Re: Hello!
quagga.input.body:
Then try AEP in Columbus.  They have a big shop and you should know some of 
the people there. 


To: Chris Germany/HOU/ECT@ECT
cc:  
Subject: Re: Hello!  

Thank you for the leads, but I am going to stay here in "the land of grey 
winter", until Todd is ready to move south.  That will hopefully be in 2 or 3 
years.
